## HttpFetchOptions.asSystemRequest property

Whether or not the request should include the "system request" header to differentiate an end user request from OpenSearchDashboards internal request. Can be read on the server-side using OpenSearchDashboardsRequest\#isSystemRequest. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
asSystemRequest?: boolean;
```
